xyz.samhal.openinghours

Class OpeningHours

  • java.lang.Object
    • xyz.samhal.openinghours.OpeningHours

  • public class OpeningHours
extends java.lang.Object
    A java-based representation of opening hours using the Time API introduced in Java 8.
    Author:
    samhal

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      OpeningHours() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      OpeningHours alwaysOpen()
      Sets the OpeningHours to be open during all times if no deviating dates are set before.
      OpeningHours alwaysOpen(java.time.LocalTime from, java.time.LocalTime to)
      Sets the OpeningHours to be open on all days during the specified times.
      OpeningHours close(java.time.DayOfWeek day)
      Sets a day of the week for which the OpeningHours are not open
      OpeningHours close(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Sets a specific date for which the OpeningHours are not open.
      boolean isOpen()
      Checks whether the OpeningHours are open during the current time and date.
      boolean isOpen(java.time.DayOfWeek day)
      Checks whether the OpeningHours are open during the specified day of the week.
      boolean isOpen(java.time.DayOfWeek day, java.time.LocalTime time)
      Checks whether the OpeningHours are open during the specified day of the week and time.
      boolean isOpen(java.time.LocalDate date)
      Checks whether the OpeningHours are open during the given date.
      boolean isOpen(java.time.LocalDateTime dateTime)
      Checks whether the OpeningHours are open during the specified time and date.
      boolean isOpen(java.time.LocalTime time)
      Checks whether the OpeningHours are open during the current date and the specified time.
      OpeningHours open(java.time.DayOfWeek day, java.time.LocalTime from, java.time.LocalTime to)
      Sets a day of the week for which the OpeningHours are open within a given time-interval.
      OpeningHours open(java.time.LocalDate date, java.time.LocalTime from, java.time.LocalTime to)
      Sets a specific date for which the OpeningHours are open within a given time-interval.
